name: Ext_R5_ObservationDefinition_date
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ObservationDefinition.date for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents ObservationDefinition.date from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ObservationDefinition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: The date (and optionally time) when the ObservationDefinition was last significantly changed. The date must change when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the ObservationDefinition changes.
element.comment: `ObservationDefinition.date` has no related element in R4B:ObservationDefinition
